Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Statement of work, activity decisions, timelines, scheduling, and resource allocation methods. Techniques will be appropriate for large and small projects within commercial, academic, or non-profit organizations.

Course Description.text: Scheduling techniques (PERT), (CPM), are presented. Time Study Methods, Work Sampling and MTM are covered.
